reviewText: well i bought the hitman: contracts iguide and i was impressed. luckily there was an iguide for driv3r which i bought rite away. for me it just makes the whole game seem richer, seeing the storyboards, movies and other bonus stuff. its like you can have your movie or you can have your movie with special features. think about it... when u buy a dvd that comes without any special features u would prolly call it a weak dvd. or at least i would. anyway i think these iguide things are really breaking new ground in the video game world and i like where it's going.
